Chauncey Billups scored 31 points and Carmelo Anthony had 14 to help the Denver Nuggets spoil Allen Iverson 's return to Philadelphia with a 93-83 win over the 76ers on Monday night. I just felt like I was back home, Allen Iverson said.`` It was deja vu. Just a real good feeling. The fans made it hard on me because they made me more nervous than I already was.''
